# **Objective 1**:
Update the repository's main `README.md` file to link it to the Demo Application hosted on HuggingFace Spaces

## **Step 1**:
Update the "Title" within the `README.md` file (first line of the file)

## **Step 2**:
Update the *Project Statement*

## **Step 3**:
Update the *Project Purpose*

## **Step 4**:
Update the *Installation Instructions*

- Replace the "INSERT-GITHUB-URL-HERE" with the public URL of the repository

## **Step 5**:
Update the *Training Script Guide*
 
 - Reference the `/configs/README.md` for default parameters

## **Step 6**:
Update the *Dataset Information*

- Replace the "INSERT URL HERE" with the public URL of the dataset

## **Step 7**:
Update the *Folder Directory*

 - Use the [githubtree](https://github.com/rescenic/githubtree) website to fill in this section
